analysis: The project currently lacks a black hole-themed UI with animated objects and slides. The existing files (test-website/styles.css, test-website/index.html, test-website/script.js) need updates to incorporate a cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The current CSS and HTML files are incomplete and do not reflect the black hole theme.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with a dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes.
Fix the syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented, including animations and interactions for the black hole theme.
